channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Canada Goose boss avoided printing ‘CEO’ on business cards for years after taking over at 27
item.description: When Dani Reiss was promoted to Canada Goose's top job at 27 years old, he couldn’t bring himself to proudly print his shiny new CEO title on paper

item.title: ‘This is the Cuban Missile Crisis in space’: Russia is building a space nuke that could wipe out every satellite in orbit, U.S. warns
item.description: “If this anti-satellite nuclear weapon would be put in space, it would be the end of the space age,” Rep. Mike Turner said.

item.title: ‘DEI’ as a dirty word: Companies are saying a lot less about diversity and equity in public filings
item.description: Use of the word “DEI” declined 68% from 2024 to 2025 in the major filings of the largest U.S. public companies. Words like words “diversity,” “racial,...

item.title: Marco Rubio Once Filed a Brief Embracing Birthright Citizenship
item.description: Rubio, a son of immigrants and now secretary of state, was responding to a 2016 lawsuit questioning his eligibility for the presidency.

item.title: A Risky Bet: Louisville’s Democratic Mayor Accommodates ICE
item.description: Craig Greenberg’s move, requested by the Trump administration, allows federal agents more time to detain immigrants who are held at the city’s jail.

item.title: Texas Democrats Set to End Walkout Over Redistricting, Allowing Redrawn Map to Pass
item.description: Democratic lawmakers returned to Texas after fleeing the state for two weeks. Republicans are ready to quickly pass a new congressional map called for...

item.title: Air Canada Flight Attendant Strike Declared Illegal by Labor Board
item.description: The Canada Industrial Relations Board ordered the flight attendants’ union to call off the job action by midday.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani met his wife on Hinge. Many American muslims meet their marriage partners in similar ways
item.description: Mamdani’s success on Hinge, and the show “Muslim Matchmaker” on Hulu, provide a glimpse into some of the ways American Muslims meet their spouses, fro...

item.title: Target and Ulta just broke up: Employees raised red flags about shoplifting, understaffing, and foot-traffic cannibalization
item.description: The two retailers announced today they’ve “mutually agreed” to end the partnership when their current agreement expires in August 2026.

item.title: Two Police Officers Are Shot and Killed at House in Utah
item.description: The officers were responding to a domestic disturbance on Sunday when a man came outside and opened fire, the police said.

item.title: Air Canada Flight Attendant Strike Declared Illegal by Labor Board
item.description: The Canada Industrial Relations Board ordered the flight attendants’ union to call off the job action by midday.

item.title: Will Oil Demand Peak Soon? Trump Administration Doesn’t Want to Hear It.
item.description: It is lashing out at the world’s leading energy organization for saying oil and gas use could start declining as the world pivots to cleaner alternati...

item.title: Live Updates: Backed By Allies, Zelensky Heads to White House to Face Hard Choice From Trump
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine, whose last Oval Office meeting ended in acrimony, was expected to hear a plan from President Trump to cede la...

item.title: Trump Is Pushing India Back Toward China
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi had been moving to align India with the United States and freeze out China. Now, efforts to rebuild ties between the Asia...
